content: crochet these modern nesting circular carry-all trays/baskets with rolled-down cuffed edges they are so handy to have around the home and are a cute way to store small items they would make lovely gifts as they work up quickly using beautiful tape yarn this circular carry-all tray is a part of the carry-all tray set that includes other shapes such as square and rectangular the square carry-all tray pattern can be found **here** 2 and the rectangular carry-all tray pattern can be found ** here 3 ** ***note that the pdf 9 pages includes all the step-by-step photos and a total of 3 patterns circular rectangular and square carry-all trays for more information see https //www allaboutami com/rectangular-carry-all-tray/ report a problem 1 https //www etsy com/ca/listing/710448987/carry-all-trays-crochet-pattern 2 https //www allaboutami com/square-carry-all-tray/ 3 https //www allaboutami com/rectangular-carry-all-tray/
